author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials here pasted awareness stickers on domestic LPG cylinders carrying out the message ‘exercise the franchise in the elections for building strong democratic form of governance.’

Outlets

The stickers were pasted at the gas agency outlets from where the cylinders been taken out for distribution.

“The messages on the stickers on the need to vote will reach faster to the voters as majority of the households’ now-a-days use LPG cylinders. Since LPG cylinders are used every day, the messages will stick to minds of the people easily”, pointed out the election officials.

Collector S. Jayandhi inaugurated the campaign.
title: LPG cylinders now carry message of voting right
